name: notion-task-management-assistant
description: An extension that helps users manage tasks more effectively by analyzing task descriptions and due dates.

scripts.start:api: cd backend/api-gateway-service && npm i && npm run dev:server
scripts.start:int: cd backend/notion-integration-service && npm i && npm run dev:server
scripts.start:ai-manager: cd backend/ai-task-manager-service && npm i && npm run dev:server
scripts.start:db: cd backend/mongodb-service && npm i && npm run dev:server
scripts.start:sync: cd backend/sync-service && npm i && npm run dev:server
scripts.start:fe: cd frontend && npm i && npm start

author: Sofia Mikhailova
